string.CommonDescription: For individuals and teams getting started with Huly.
string.RareDescription: For individual creatives, freelancers, and micro-agencies.
string.EpicDescription: For professional creative companies and small businesses.
string.LegendaryDescription: Best for large multiple teams that need maximum capabilities.
string.SelectPlanToBegin: Select a plan below to get started
string.UpgradeDescription: You will be charged up to ${amount} immediately. The exact amount depends on your current billing period.
string.DowngradeDescription: You will receive a credit of up to ${amount} for the remaining subscription time. The downgrade takes effect immediately.
string.CancelDescription: Your subscription will remain active until the end of the billing period.
string.UncancelDescription: Your subscription will be reactivated and continue from the end of the current billing period.
string.LimitReached: Workspace limit reached, some functionality may be disabled. Upgrade to restore full access.
string.RestrictedPlans: Only the workspace owner or billing manager can change the subscription plan
